Austin Hodges

About Me

Born:

November 2, 2000

Hometown:

Kingwood, Texas

Education:

Currently enrolled at Texas A&M in General Engineering, Class of 2023

Family

Austin has an immediate family of two wonderful parents with three beautiful older sisters, one younger brother, and two brother-in-laws.(as shown in picture above)

Hobbies:

Austin loves to play many sports such as football and basketball. He also enjoys to read books, mostly preferring fantasy or fiction books.
Austin also is a mild tech enthusiast, loving to learn about the new innovations in computing and computer construction. Austin loves the
outdoors, and enjoys going hunting and fishing with family and friends. Austin also enjoys playing video games with friends, even playing
the game Super Smash Brothers Ultimate competetively in College Station.
